DOC.brief_summary: N-acetylcysteine may prevent acute kidney injury high risk patient undergo off-pump coronary artery bypass graft .
DOC.brief_title: Effect N-acetylcysteine Prevention Acute Kidney Injury High Risk Patients Undergoing Off-pump Coronary Artery Bypass Graft
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo offpump coronary artery bypass surgery meet one follow criterion ; preoperative serum creatinine > 1.4 mg/dl Age > 70 year Diabetes mellitus leave ventricular ejection fraction < 35 % congestive heart failure ( NYHA III IV ) emergency surgery reoperation preoperative acute renal failure , patient dialysis , use Nacetylcystein within 5 day surgery , history hypersensitivity Nacetylcystein
